name: MAGEROOM
description:
You are a mage.

A true mage, a tree wizard.

The last of your kind.

I wonder why?

You're locked in a box for a reason.

A solo project by Rowin "Rory" van der Schee made in a school course of 8 weeks time. I really wanted audio but uh this really was too much work to try and do that as well so I just left it to make sure I would be ok after this. I also had some stuff running alongside this so that made it all a little more challenging. I had fun though!

Thanks to my friends for keeping me sane during all this :)

If you are at all curious about how games get to be made, I put some behind the scenes stuff on my twitter:

https://twitter.com/RealRoryPumpkin/status/1391466520795127812

If you wanna know more about this game or me, just throw me a question there!
